Key Match Events: Ryan Mendes doubled their lead with a goal
Kevin Pina secured the victory with a brilliant strike
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde secured top spot in Group B
Cape Verde became the first team to qualify for the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations last-16
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde defeated Mozambique in a tough group containing Egypt and Ghana
Bebe made his Cape Verde debut in 2022 after switching international allegiance from Portugal
